website_summaries.verdict: This is the best option for adults or teens with its taller stem and larger wheels.
pros: The smooth wheels and comfortable design of the A6 make it the best scooter for short commutes
The large wheels handle bumps and cracks smoothly
cons: The large frame is fairly heavy, making it difficult to carry

customer_reviews.title: Great for a short commute.
customer_reviews.text: My work is far enough where I don't really enjoy walking but close enough where I can't justify driving. This scooter is the perfect solution! The big wheels mean it's nice n fast and it can definitely handle cracks in the sidewalk better than the original Razor. It is also much quieter! I'm pretty tall for a lady, comin' in at 6 ft, and the handle bars are the perfect height when completely extended. Nice to see they are making em tall friendly these days! I'd imagine it would be a comfortable ride for anyone ~6'2" or under.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Scooter is awesome for tall people
customer_reviews.text: 6 feet 8 inches and comfortable on this scooter. Used for commuting in NYC and playing with my daughter who also has a smaller scooter. It’s fun and all the other adults are secretly or openly jealous! Big wheels are good for travel glide not good for tricks. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ava K Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Great Adult Scooter!!
customer_reviews.text: I read A LOT of different reviews for which scooter to get and I settled with this A6. Hands down, this scooter glides so easily. The 10" wheels make it effortless to glide down the street. The anti-rattle neck & handles feature does work, its a lot quieter than other scooters. It takes only seconds to break down to carry. I am very happy with this scooter.
customer_reviews.author: R I

customer_reviews.title: Love This!
customer_reviews.text: Love this scooter! The wheels are huge. The scooter itself is very big but easy to manage. Just had to pop the handlebars in out of the box and it was ready to go. I hadn't ridden a scooter in years, but there was no learning curve required here. Just get on and go. The scooter is very fast and a little jarring, even with the big wheels, when it hits a crack in the sidewalk. But overall, so much fun to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Love getting around the city on this
customer_reviews.text: Love getting around the city on this. I may be a bit rough on it—but I don’t do tricks—so it isn’t as silent as when I first got it. The worst part of this is trying to ride in he rain. I still commit rail and shine. The back wheel kicks up the water and dirt from the street to the back of your legs. Gross! I’ve been trying to figure out a simple clothing solution, but hopefully the next model fixes these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Hogains

customer_reviews.title: Great for up to a 5 mile commute
customer_reviews.text: I've had the A6 Scooter for a couple months now. It's been working great for the 2 mile commute I make to work each day. Minimal wear and tear so far, the handles haven't fell apart. I ride pretty fast and it gets sketchy sometimes going downhill because it's light and the brake gets hot.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: A head turner.
customer_reviews.text: A must buy for the big boys. Runs so smoothly and made of heavy duty material. I'm 230lbs and I ride it without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzy

customer_reviews.title: for what it is, this was designed well.
customer_reviews.text: For around a hundred bucks, this is amazing. I use it to go to Subway and get a sandwitch and just take it out on my breaks at lunch. I keep it in the trunk of my car and it's super convenient! You have to be careful with the locking mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: the king of scooters
customer_reviews.text: If you are a large adult looking for a scooter - this is it. The big wheels might not glide as well as the A5 but the smoothness and pleasure of the larger frame make this a joy to ride. Sturdy and fast. It is bigger than your regular scooters and the folding mechanism takes a little more effort but what you get in exchange is worth it. If I had an extra $30 I would have gone for the white version.
customer_reviews.author: Br4ss5hove1

customer_reviews.title: Get the A5
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I convinced myself I would need this size. It honestly is so big and heavy it's so annoying to carry. The release is also not quick at all. I bought this used and BOY is it very used! The handles are a little broken too so I can't pull them out to hang on the side. Really just wish I had bought the A5!
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Great ride, no matter what.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 60 years old, my son is 10. My wife calls him MiniMe. He took this well built scooter out and in 15 minutes, wiped out and gashed his knee. I was like, tough it up boy! And took the scooter and proceeded to go over some jumps in the parking lot. Second jump, laid out flat, like a beached whale. Two weeks later I’m writing this review. Ankle bigger than your head! When will the swelling go down? I’m thinking about calling Razor customer support and asking this question.
customer_reviews.author: pokwang

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic scooter
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Iam 6 feet tall, 205 pounds, i can position the steering handle at a comfortable height. The scooter rides very smooth and it's quite low to the ground providing a firm ride. Excellent scooter
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Colors are nice. Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: My girl loves it. Exactly what she wanted. This is her first big wheel scoot. Upgraded from the everyday little razor scooters. Colors are nice. Easy set up. The little kickstand is actually pretty useful. Cheaper on this link than other places I was looking, which is obviously a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: razor scooter
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this scooter, however it was very poorly packaged. The package was all torn up and had several large holes in it. We were lucky that some of the loose parts had not fallen out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: PRETTY GOOD RIDE
customer_reviews.text: Got this to do some local traveling without having to pull out the bike. I use this when I don't want to deal with having to lock up the bike at the destination. The scooter wheels make it a nice cruise so you don't have to pedal as often. I had hoped it would cruise fast as well but it does not. Prob need to change wheels and bearing but save that for another day. It just is easy cruising long distances with less work.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: A great scooter at a good price
customer_reviews.text: My husband got this scooter so he could scoot with our granddaughter. It's adjustable to height and he keeps up with her quite well. It's stable and sturdy and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Whitworth

customer_reviews.title: Fast and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my scooter for about a month now. It was a great investment. I use it to get around for work and it is everything I hoped it would be. It is a fast smooth ride and I have had no issues with it. Glad I purchased it!
customer_reviews.author: Splendor

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids at heart
customer_reviews.text: Good times for adults. Scooted 5K on a paved trail with my grandson on his little Razor. We had great fun. This scooter performed well with a full-size adult aboard. Might have to purchase another for my wife, because she keeps "borrowing" it.
customer_reviews.author: GlennerationX

customer_reviews.title: Smooth riding kick scooter
customer_reviews.text: I started out with my kids' scooters with the puck-sized wheels, then to an A5 and now to this. The difference in ride comfort, glide and sturdiness is very clear. The white design is really nice too. Once folded, I am able to fit this into one of my larger backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but can't really brake.
customer_reviews.text: I broke my leg on this but that was my fault and the scooter is still fine. Great for adults who don't try to go down any real hill.
customer_reviews.author: NTA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scooter for adults
customer_reviews.text: I’m the coolest Mom in the neighborhood now. Although two others have copied me. I Added a Phone holder and a eater bottle holder! It’s perfect and the big wheels make it so you don’t have to push so often. Big back break works well!
customer_reviews.author: lauren eldridge

customer_reviews.title: A Great Vehicle for College Students
customer_reviews.text: The scooter is great and sturdy! Only problem is folding it down is a process. However, I am able to get from class to class very quickly and am never late. Going over bumps are no problem and controlling the scooter is easy. When going over speed bumps be careful because sometimes the bottom of the scooter will get scraped if the bump is not wide enough for the scooter to ride over both wheels at a time.
customer_reviews.author: KLEE

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to transport.
customer_reviews.text: Nice scooter. Easily runs over bumps in sidewalks, easy to ride. I'm a 46 year old with a hip that acts up from time to time, got this to scoot around when it's painful to get outside to walk. It helps a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy J. McCane

customer_reviews.title: be advised scooters are very dangerous
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product a lot for about a year until I fell going slowly through a cross walk and very very seriously injured myself-broke my left arm in two places, dislocated shoulder, rotator cuff tear and pinched nerve. the wheels are very smooth, no grip. if you buy this product, you may want to always keep one leg floating to brace yourself in case the front wheel slides out. never wear a heavy backpack while riding. back packs equal extra gravity. you will fall on your face or shoulder faster and harder.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: scooter
customer_reviews.text: good scooter for the price the steering headset was not great but the rest of it is sturdy and rolls nice. originally bought one scooter but my 9-year-old daughter liked it so much I had to buy another, its a fun set of wheels if you want to stop and you're a bigger person it's a little weak, I am 170 pounds and stopping on a medium grade downhill was not great but with a little skill and common sense, it is still workable. amazon price was good so I replaced the headset and its good to go
customer_reviews.author: colin daniel

customer_reviews.title: Good for tall aduts
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. He loves it. Fast shipping. Easy already put together. He cant wait for spring. He did ride in the house and fit him perfectly for being taller.
customer_reviews.author: HLS8

customer_reviews.title: Very good just be careful
customer_reviews.text: Have to make sure to tighten the knob thoroughly, or it is a bit wobbly. Other than that, this thing is awesome. Even if there is a slight hill, this thing will glide for a very long distance. Just be careful when going over a bump, or it will bottom out at the kickstand.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Spagnoli

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: Runs smooth, good sized foot bed,but does rattle quite a bit. Not a big deal with bopping around the neighborhood with our son but if I used it to commute it would be annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Adult and Teen Scouter
customer_reviews.text: Great scooter for teens and adults! Great handle height for people between 5'2"-6'2". Features a Large deck, kick stand and large wheels. The large wheels make it great for any terrain, on road and off the road.
customer_reviews.author: CharlestonGeek

customer_reviews.title: Box Damaged, Good Scooter
customer_reviews.text: This scooter was purchased as a gift for a 15 year old's birthday. The thin box arrived in the packaging as if it were just purchased off of a shelf. In turn, it has numerous holes in it, was taped numerous times like it was previously used, and the tool to tighten the bolts was not in the box. It must have fallen out of one of the holes. The scooter rides well.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Stepp

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome. Whole family has Razors now.
customer_reviews.text: My kids have the original Razo and an A5 (which my wife and I would ride sometimes) so we ordered the A6 (two actually) and freaking love them. We toss them into the back when we go to parks or friends' houses or whatever. They get used way more than bikes these days.
customer_reviews.author: C. Denny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing city transport scooter, the folding 'open/close' broke (stuck)
customer_reviews.text: Big wheels, feels real sturdy and lightweight, I still use it for urban transport often. The fold -open/close mechanism - was not so easy to use from the beginning, and eventually got stuck (while open, after like 10 month of usage), so I cannot fold them now. folding is not so essential I found out (lowering the handlebar is good enough)
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Calev

customer_reviews.title: Really bad
customer_reviews.text: Really bad this is dangerous do not buy if you love your life don’t get this please
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Love the bigger wheels!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I’m 6’ tall, about 165lb, love the bigger wheel. Folding isn’t as seamless as I would’ve liked but not a big deal at all. Kickstand is handy too
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Huge
customer_reviews.text: This is the biggest scooter ever. Definitely big enough for an adult. I love it. Not for kids under 8yr old only because it's so big. Great buy though.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Use Right From The Box
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a brother who is a body builder and large frame. Problem is my wife likes it so much that she keeps riding it around the house. Easy to use right out of the box. Box was great to use as checked luggage.
customer_reviews.author: JustTheFactsMaam

customer_reviews.title: Getting good use
customer_reviews.text: Needed one for the hubs to keep up with our son. He loves it! Wish it had some suspension but it works great overall.
customer_reviews.author: SEL

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter / adjustable and sturdy construction
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bought this earlier so I could have pre dented getting an electric one for my 8 year old son :) ... great scooter get one and pass on the electric version!
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Box damaged but scooter seems ok
customer_reviews.text: I'm unhappy with the condition of the box when it arrived. This was a Christmas gift for my son but because of the concern it might be damaged, I let him go ahead and inspect it. It seems to be a sturdy scooter. He likes the bigger wheels and telescoping handlebars.
customer_reviews.author: Majksmom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!  Just buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this scooter to ride with my kids. I'm 5'9 170lbs. This scooter is great! Its very well built, and fast! The only flaw I could pick out is that the brake is not very effective. But who cares! I want to go fast. I love the fact that it folds up nicely for storage as well. I would recommend this scooter to anyone. Was deffinatly a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wright

customer_reviews.title: Awesome razor!
customer_reviews.text: The construction is rock solid, the larger wheels ans adjustable handle is far superior to the original razors with the tiny wheels.
customer_reviews.author: ryantlinder6

customer_reviews.title: Great for Adults
customer_reviews.text: Great Adult Size Scooter. Handle can be located high enough for someone over 6ft. Wheels are good for smooth surfaces, if your going to be on rougher surfaces maybe try the Moongoose Scooter with larger air filled tires.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality scooter, the big wheels are so nice for a smooth ride. it's easy to fold but won't collapse on you- just be sure to check the tightness every once in a while!
customer_reviews.author: Chevy Reigles

customer_reviews.title: I love what it can be .. wheel squeaks
customer_reviews.text: I wish the wheels were more sturdy. The back wheel seems to squeak and I think it has to do with the wheel. I wish the maker would send me a wheel to try it.
customer_reviews.author: Michele J. Walutes

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun!
customer_reviews.text: Am riding it around the lake, with the dog. Feels like we are going down the hill even when we go up.
customer_reviews.author: Maiia Muiia

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter everyone that see it wants it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I can ride with a 3.5 year old on a bike around the neighborhood. Surprised how fast it is and comfortable it is. Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: michael serrano

customer_reviews.title: Good scooter for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great scooter for the money. I bought two for me and my dad to get around LS fest a bit quicker. The big wheels make it good for rolling over stuff that you normally wouldn't be able to with a regular scooter. I'm 6'4" and the handle bars come up to a perfect riding height. Also 280 pounds and haven't broke it yet. Overall good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Wow got it for my granddaughter and my wife loves it as well. Very smooth ride and well made. Stop looking ! This scooter will not disappoint you.
customer_reviews.author: mark t bakara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for adults!
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent and coasts for along time. It rides so smooth and is pretty quiet! Can’t wait to bring this with me on my journeys!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hubert

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my kids because they out grew there smaller ones. They love these. Will probably get some for my husband and I as well
customer_reviews.author: lisanita

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for a kids’ scooter, this is a great one to buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and it is well made, great quality and perfect scooter for kids
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If you’re looking for a fast ride this is it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this scooter. It’s exactly what I was looking for. I can ride with my kids and don’t have to put in a ton of effort. It rides fast and smooth. My kids each have Osprey dirt scooters which are smooth on rough terrain, but not very fast. if you’re looking for a fast commute on smooth roads or walkways, this is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie S.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride for tall people
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’1” and this model fits me comfortably. Very fun, and love the huge wheels. Really smooth ride. Easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: gringo4ninja

customer_reviews.title: Brakes a little soft
customer_reviews.text: I love this scooter! Quiet, smooth, well built. Just wish there were hand brakes instead of the rear tire fender brake.
customer_reviews.author: pamftbragg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Scooter
customer_reviews.text: Got this for myself when we went into lock down. Perfect for adults to keep up with the kids or run errands with. Easy to use and collapse. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: TrendyDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Great for taller kids!
customer_reviews.text: Smooth ride. Very sturdy. For the important part, I bought it for my 13 yr old (6’3”) who was heartbroken his original razor was too short. It fits him perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Purtteman

customer_reviews.title: Good quality of a scooter.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift to my grandson. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: E . W.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Scooter!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new scooter!! I didn't know what to expect, but it is WONDERFUL!! Rides smooth.. folds easily and securely.. all around great! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Suki

customer_reviews.title: Great scooter 🛴
customer_reviews.text: Great scooter! 🛴 It came nicely packaged unlike a previous reviewer. I purchased this for my son to commute to school & he enjoys the smooth ride, especially how it folds with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Lei Lanie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: This scooter was too big I returned it and bought the A-5
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: It's not super
customer_reviews.text: If you don't use it for 1-2 weeks, the folding mechanism gets stuck and it's very difficult to unfold the scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Federico Bucchi

customer_reviews.title: Fast kick Scooter
customer_reviews.text: Cool scooter that is light weight and good for short commutes. The wheels roll very fast and feel smooth over almost any surface. The scooter is well built and can handle a person over 6 feet tall and 200 pounds. I would recommend this for anybody kids to adults.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.  Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great adult scooter. Had the A5 lux and decided to upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: ED

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My little girl was so excited about this scooter! She loves how big the wheels are.
customer_reviews.author: KandK

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten two so far and gonna get one or two more for me and my other son
customer_reviews.author: JellsBells

customer_reviews.title: Smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: It runs great and the shipping was fast. The only thing is i wish they had more colors to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very compatible and comfortable  for many heights.
customer_reviews.text: Love that this is so easy for my wife to lift and use with her bad back, and i can also use it with comfort and ease at 6'2". Great little ride.
customer_reviews.author: mothermayi

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it, She uses it around the dorm in college. Very smooth and easy to ride.
customer_reviews.author: Jose M.

customer_reviews.title: Fast and fun to ride.
customer_reviews.text: The big wheels make this scooter fast and keep you from doing faceplants on the sidewalk cracks.
customer_reviews.author: HonkyTonk Hero

customer_reviews.title: Height
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this Xmas gift because it is adjustable and the height is a perfect match. Plus it has a kick stand
customer_reviews.author: Diana Ippolito

customer_reviews.title: rarely, my gifts, this nephew likes
customer_reviews.text: nephew, at UC berkeley, really really likes it. price, package and delivery just right.
customer_reviews.author: mike murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great for college
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for son heading off to college and he loves it. He can fold it up and carry it into class with him.
customer_reviews.author: Paige S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. My husband loves it as much as my daughter! Sturdy, well made and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Rua

customer_reviews.title: this one looked like a Porsche
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 12 year old -- as an upgrade to an old (and well used) Razor he has had since he was 6. Compared to the old one, this one looked like a Porsche! lol. Big wheels made breaking a little more challenging....just fyi. (Requires my son to reach up a lot farther than he is used to....I'm sure he will get better with practice...but giving parents a heads-up). My son reports that this scooter is a lot faster than his old (little wheel) one -- which thrilled him (me, not so much). Amazon had best price.
customer_reviews.author: Phoebe P.

customer_reviews.title: Sized for adults
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6’3 husband. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Ward

customer_reviews.title: Lovely birthday present
customer_reviews.text: First of all, it is very pretty, the wheels are bigger than I thought. Love the design as well. So far it is still steady. Love
customer_reviews.author: Queenie

customer_reviews.title: Great scoot for tall dude!
customer_reviews.text: Out of box. Riding the neighborhood with my sons in 3 minutes. So much easier taking these on road trips than all the family bikes! I’m 6’ 6” and 198lbs. The A6 is legit.
customer_reviews.author: DeVere

customer_reviews.title: Great Scooter Except in the Rain
customer_reviews.text: Great scooter! It is built solid with no rattling. With the extra large wheels, it rides very smooth. -1 Star because the rear fender/brake is too short to prevent rain and mud from being flung onto the back of your legs. It is no fun getting to work with soaked and dirty legs. It needs to be 3" longer.
customer_reviews.author: SactoDoug

customer_reviews.title: Fun For Anyone (Adult That Is)
customer_reviews.text: Son loves this. We were all able to ride it fast and immediate without practice. Even a 70 year old :)
customer_reviews.author: MelM

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy used scooters...
customer_reviews.text: I understand it was a used item. It was very dangerous as well. The scooter stem would not lock into place. This item should not have been for sale.
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: Great for exercise and building stability
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with first one bought last year. So, we got a second so we can do rides together.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and not as good as the ads tell u Trembling already
customer_reviews.author: tony hatch

customer_reviews.title: It is portable...
customer_reviews.text: Love the product it help me to exercised and get to places very fast.
customer_reviews.author: paris b

customer_reviews.title: Big kid fun.
customer_reviews.text: We ride with our 5 year old around the neighborhood now.
customer_reviews.author: Clozer

customer_reviews.title: Folds even while riding
customer_reviews.text: Many rattles that I have had to fix. Has folded on me a few times and thrown me forwards.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Awesome doesn't scratch the surface!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this scooter. I haven't been all that active lately, and for me, this is a good way to get moving again.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis Family

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall people
customer_reviews.text: Razor scooter for tall people....WIN! My daughter is 6 ft. and really wanted a new scooter. This is perfect, she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: ABO

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: It was a great scooter, very smooth, I liked the look. Great commuter scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Scooter for Adults
customer_reviews.text: Very good bearings and design. A bit too noisy and fragile when using on irregular surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur P Russi Neto

customer_reviews.title: Great for commuting
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Great for short commuting or longer trips if you have the time.
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome scooter. Used it for several months now and have no regrets. Great price and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: It accompanied me all the summer, I use it to go to work every day, saving a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Great time saver
customer_reviews.text: It is a great for short little trips when you need to get there in a short amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: michael asuncion

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fold anymore
customer_reviews.text: Only a month and a half of having it I can't fold it anymore. Is there a warranty?
customer_reviews.author: claudia Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Tall people can ride this scooter comfortably
customer_reviews.text: Great Scooter, bought it for my daughter, and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Solid, reliable, but bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Solid, reliable, but bigger than expected. It couldn’t fit in my luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Cvetkoski

customer_reviews.title: Took a while to receive but very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Gift. Took a while to receive but very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nax

customer_reviews.title: Awesome scooter 👍
customer_reviews.text: Love this big wheels Razor scooter. My 7y daughter and I are enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: I-JU

customer_reviews.title: My son loves that it is bigger than his old ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves that it is bigger than his old scooter and that it has a kick stand to keep it upright..
customer_reviews.author: T. Danes

customer_reviews.title: beats walking!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got one for my niece to cruise around campus she seems to be a happy camper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Razor A6 Kick Scooter
product_meta.description: You're never too tall to ride! This Razor A6 kick scooter was designed and constructed with taller riders in mind. Built to last with a super-strong, folding aluminum frame and new, patent-pending, anti-rattle technology, this A6 offers the smoothest ride.
feature_bullets: Designed and built specifically for taller riders
Features Razor’s tallest handlebars, adjustable up to an incredible height of 42” (1067 mm), and extra-long, 13.4” (340 mm) deck for more foot room
Spoked, ultra-large 10” (254 mm), urethane wheels and super-strong, aluminum frame with patent-pending, anti-rattle handlebars and folding mechanism, ensure the smoothest, quietest ride around
Rear-fender brake for an effortless, gliding stop
Designed for riders ages 8 and up weighing up to 220 pounds (100 kg)
